footer.operating: Operating in Spain, UK, and Netherlands

conneqtivity.heroDescription: A family of innovative brands delivering connected solutions across healthcare, mobility, and safety.

careconneqt.name: Care Conneqt
careconneqt.description: Comprehensive elderly care solutions combining smart devices, professional nursing, and family connectivity.

medconneqt.description: Healthcare technology platform connecting patients, providers, and medical data seamlessly.

mobility.name: Conneqt Mobility

clara.greeting: Hi! I'm Clara, your Care Conneqt assistant. How can I help you today?
clara.subtitle: Your Care Companion • Available 24/7
clara.placeholder: Ask me anything about our care services...

ineke.greeting: Hello! I'm Ineke, your nursing assistant. I can help you access member data, find care protocols, check device status, and more. How can I assist you?
ineke.subtitle: Your AI Nursing Assistant

claraMember.greeting: Hello! I'm Clara, your personal care companion. How can I help you today?
claraMember.subtitle: Your Care Companion • Available 24/7

claraFamily.greeting: Hello! I'm Clara, here to help you stay connected with your loved one's care. What would you like to know?
claraFamily.subtitle: Family Support • Available 24/7
claraFamily.placeholder: Ask about your loved one's care...

isabella.greeting: Hello! I'm Isabella, your facility management assistant. How can I help with operations today?
isabella.subtitle: Facility Assistant • Available 24/7

lee.greeting: Greetings. I am Lee "The Brain", master AI orchestrator. I have full system access and can provide executive-level insights. How may I assist you?
lee.subtitle: Master AI Orchestrator • Full Access
lee.placeholder: Ask Lee anything about the system...

aiGuardian.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI Guardian. How are you feeling today? I'm here to help with any health questions or just to chat.
aiGuardian.title: AI Guardian
